name: Attack on Lizilla
description:
Warning: Audio is loud
Please forgive the awful resolution as much as possible, we encountered a unresolvable build error and this was the only build we had that worked :c
Defend the city from the evil Lizilla!

Keep the buildings safe from Lizilla's destructive attacks!
Explore the map to gather ammo for you weapons.
Be careful though, your attacks are just are powerful!

CONTROLS:
Move - WASD
Use Weapon - Left Mouse Button
1 - Select Assault Rifle
2 - Select Grenade
3 - Select Laser
4 - Select Nuke
